# Wilbert Chandra - Data & AI Engineer

Wilbert Chandra is a Data Engineer and AI Engineer based in Jakarta, Indonesia, specializing in scalable data pipelines, distributed AI systems, and production-ready architectures.

## Roles
- **Data Engineer Intern** at **Samsung R&D Institute Indonesia** (Mar 2025 – Present)
- **Backend & AI Engineer** at **UniPal / PKM Indonesia** (Jul 2024 – Sep 2024)
- **Lead AI Engineer** for **MRI Segmentation Project** (Jun 2024 – Dec 2024)

## Technical Stack
- **Languages**: Python, SQL
- **AI & Frameworks**: TensorFlow, PyTorch, LangChain, Airflow, VLLM, RAG
- **Cloud & Infrastructure**: AWS, Docker, GitHub Actions, Milvus, Neon (PostgreSQL), Vercel
- **Frontend**: Astro, React 19, Tailwind CSS, GSAP

## Key Projects
- **SatuDua**: Emergency Response System featuring real-time transcription and AI summaries. Built with React Native, FastAPI, and Azure AI.
- **UniPal**: Conversational AI platform with low-latency interaction using Python, Gemini, and ElevenLabs.
- **MRI Segmentation**: Deep learning model for medical scan segmentation using PyTorch and CNN architectures.

## Selected Publications
- **Multiclass Eye Disease Detection**: Published in *Procedia Computer Science (Elsevier)*. Focuses on lightweight deep learning for retinal conditions.
- **RSNA Degenerative Lumbar Spine Classification**: Published in *IEEE Xplore*. Focuses on automated spinal condition detection using CNN ensembles.

## Contact
- **Website**: https://wilbertchandra.com (or your domain)
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/GilbertKrantz
- **Location**: Jakarta, Indonesia
